text:
@PressSec Well, how many more of Tulsa attendees catch COVID-19 also? Was it not that maskless appearance been seen as the very sign of approval for Trump?
I have just heard they all were demanded not to wear a mask.
That's criminal!   That's at least negligent homicide!
#TrumpOut2020
